mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(id, productId, cartType) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{type});
INSERT INTO cart(id, productId, cartType, s_optionId, s_stock) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{cartType}, #{option}, #{stock});
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.imgId, B.imgType, B.imgURL, C.* FROM cart AS A LEFT JOIN image AS B ON A.productId = B.productId LEFT JOIN product AS C ON A.productId = C.productId WHERE id = #{userId} AND cartType = #{type} AND B.imgType = 'product_M'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE id = #{userId} AND cartType = #{type} AND productId = #{productId};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE id = #{userId} AND productId = #{productId} AND s_optionId= #{option} AND cartType = #{cartType};
SELECT A.*, B.p_option, B.p_stock FROM cart AS A LEFT JOIN product_option AS B ON A.s_optionId = B.p_optionId WHERE id = #{id} AND cartType = 'cart';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE id = #{id} AND cartType = 'cart';
SELECT A.*, B.* FROM product AS A LEFT JOIN image AS B ON A.productId = B.productId WHERE A.productId = #{productId} AND B.imgType = 'product_M';
SELECT p_stock FROM product_option WHERE p_optionId = #{optionId};

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM member_has_coupon AS A LEFT JOIN coupon AS B ON A.couponId = B.couponId WHERE A.id = #{userId} AND curdate() BETWEEN B.couponPeriod_start AND B.couponPeriod_end AND A.couponYN = 'N';
SELECT * FROM product_option AS A LEFT JOIN product AS B ON A.productId = B.productId WHERE p_optionId = #{optionPrice};
